name: Azure Skies - Local Multiplayer Demo
description:
Work with a friend on one keyboard & mouse to pilot a blimp and complete the objectives! Communication is key! 

CURRENT FEATURES:
- 2 player local co-op

PLANNED FEATURES:
- 2v2 coop competitive battles

- 3 selectable blimps 

- 3 explorable maps

- Projectile types

- Online multiplayer (maybe??)

- actual music, hopefully

Keep in mind, this is currently VERY much a work in progress; there's still plenty of work to be done, but I wanted to get it in peoples' hands ASAP to get some thoughts out in the open!

Currently only the 2-player co-op mode is available in the game, although it supports 2v2 competitive battles as well (Not many people have 4 USB controllers laying around, so that'll have to do for now.) Stay tuned!
